metadata.inclusion:
1. Pull out the battery insulator
2. The LED indicator will turn on briefly
3. Press the Test Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds
4. Press and release the Tamper Switch once
5. Activate the Door Contact once (open and close)
metadata.exclusion: Press the Test Button 3 times within 1.5 seconds. The Door Contact will be removed from the Z-wave network.
metadata.reset: Press and hold the Test Button for 10 seconds.
